General.Name: Mercato Partners Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Mercato Partners Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses or entities. It focuses on identifying, acquiring, and operating a business in technology or branded consumer products sector. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Cottonwood Heights, Utah.
General.Address: 2750 East Cottonwood Parkway, Cottonwood Heights, UT, United States, 84121
